name: Drowned Maiden
description: The Drowned Maiden is a Medium-sized undead creature associated with decay, possessing flowing hair that she uses as whips in combat.
memorable: Her ability to grapple and drain strength from her victims is both unique and terrifying.
goals: To manipulate and harm adventurers, using deception and crowd control tactics.
relations: Might be encountered with other undead or malevolent creatures.
environment: Typically found in damp, decaying locations like swamps or ruins.
strengths: Immune to necrotic and poison damage; manipulative abilities through grappling and illusions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks; susceptible to strength reduction effects.
attacks: Her Hair attacks allow for grappling and deal slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Draining Kiss inflicts psychic damage and reduces the target's Strength score.
additional_information: Can grapple up to three creatures at a time
Creates illusions to ambush and deceive
Immune to charmed, exhausted, and frightened conditions
test_queries: grappling undead with strength reduction abilities
creature that uses illusions to ambush
undead that drains life through kiss
